mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bg_like WHERE midx=#{midx} AND pidx=#{pidx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bg_cart where (midx = #{midx}) and (oidx = #{oidx})
mapper.insert: insert into bg_cart(cart_idx, midx, oidx, QUANTITY) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{midx}, #{oidx}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select cart_idx,d.main, b.pname, c.oname, a.quantity, c.addprice, b.price, b.saleprice, c.pidx, c.stock from bg_cart a join bg_option c on a.oidx=c.oidx join bg_product b on c.pidx=b.pidx join bg_image d on b.pidx=d.pidx where midx=#{midx}
SELECT count(*) FROM bg_cart WHERE midx=#{midx}

SELECT li.pidx, pr.pname, pr.saleprice, im.main, li.interest_idx FROM bg_like li JOIN bg_product pr ON pr.pidx = li.pidx JOIN bg_image im ON im.pidx = li.pidx WHERE midx=#{midx} AND li.rdate >= to_char(sysdate-365)
AND pr.kind='R' AND pr.kind='E' AND pr.kind='N' AND pr.kind='B'
ORDER BY li.pidx ASC
